titleStmt.title: Arcana dogmatum anti-remonstrantium. Or the Calvinists cabinet unlock'd. In an apology for Tilenus, against a pretended vindication of the synod of Dort. At the provocation of Master R. Baxter, held forth in the preface to his Grotian religion. Together, with a few soft drops let fall upon the papers of Master Hickman.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivie lane.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "Grotian religion discovered" by Richard Baxter and to works of Henry Hickman, in defense of "La doctrine des synodes de d'Ordrecht et de Alès" by Daniel Tilenus.
"An examination of Master Baxters XIX, and XX. sections" has divisional title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
